categorization.name: Email Categorization
categorization.template:
You are an email assistant. Categorize this email into ONE category only.

Categories:
- Important: Needs awareness but no action
- To-Do: Requires action from recipient  
- Newsletter: Marketing, updates, promotions
- Spam: Unsolicited or suspicious

Email:
From: {from_sender}
Subject: {subject}
Body: {body}

Respond with ONLY the category name (one word).

auto_reply.name: Auto-Reply Draft
auto_reply.template:
You are a professional email assistant. Write a polite, concise reply.

Original Email:
From: {from_sender}
Subject: {subject}
Body: {body}

Instructions:
- Be professional and friendly
- Keep it brief (2-3 short paragraphs)
- For meetings: confirm or ask for details
- For requests: acknowledge and provide timeline
- No greetings or signatures needed

Write the reply:
